build.buildCommand: pnpm install --no-frozen-lockfile && DATABASE_URL=postgresql://dummy:dummy@localhost:5432/dummy pnpm --filter @metapulse/db prisma generate && pnpm --filter @metapulse/db build && pnpm --filter @metapulse/shared build && pnpm --filter @metapulse/api build

deploy.startCommand: cd packages/db && DATABASE_URL=$DATABASE_URL pnpm prisma generate && cd ../../apps/api && pnpm start:prod
